name: wuhdappusdat

scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules && cd windows-active-process && nw-gyp rebuild --target=0.45.3 --arch=x64
scripts.post-install: cd node_modules && cd windows-active-process && nw-gyp rebuild --target=0.45.3 --arch=x64

author: TheJaredWilcurt
ManifestComments: Node.js 13 was the last version to officially support Windows 7
NW.js 0.45.3 was the last version to support Node (uses v13.13.0)
windows-active-process does a native build based on OS/Arch/Node version
Global Node version must be v13.13.0
